name: JPOP Music Radio Free
description:
Listen live to the latest and best J-POP and J-Rock music - all in one convenient place without ads or presenters - just the music. Listen to different genres of Jpop from your favorite Jpop idols.

**FEATURES**
- Apple TV integration
- Background play and control - carry on with other apps while still listening to your favorite songs
- Ability to pause music
- Song data and controls shows on lock screen
- Share a song with your friends via Twitter, Facebook,Email, SMS and Youtube integration
- Last.fm integration let's you see the song name, artist name and album cover while you're listening.
- Dedicated music channels with just music, no talking, just the music
